about_the_game:
This is the OST of The Good Cat and The Graduate Life.

Hi, I am the author of the game, here is a message to you!

Thank you for checking out the original soundtrack of the game.
I made the game and composed these songs during my graduate life, they might not made by a professional musician but by a dedicated heart. I sincerely hope the game and music somehow bring you joy.

So, feel free to get the original soundtrack! Your support means a lot to me.
